entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -12.6°C

Temperature: -12.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

Dewpoint: -14.8°C

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
